snippet: At the hearing of Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, accused of killing 16 civilians in Afghanistan, several soldiers testified that Sergeant Bales was calm and compliant when he turned himself in.
abstract: Several soldiers at hearing of Staff Sgt Robert Bales, accused of killing 16 civilians in Afghanistan, testify that Sergeant Bales was calm and compliant when he turned himself in; remarks could pose high hurdle for defense lawyers, who have indicated Bales's mental health would be big part of defense.
lead_paragraph: At the hearing of Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, accused of killing 16 civilians in Afghanistan, several soldiers testified that Sergeant Bales was calm and compliant when he turned himself in.
